title: 2016 Set Operations Problem
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the least "},{"type":"text","text":"integer","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":"  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that if any 2016 elements are removed from the "},{"type":"text","text":"set","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \\{1, 2,\\ldots,N\\} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", one can still find 2016 distinct numbers among the remaining elements with sum "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since any 2016 elements are removed, suppose we remove the integers from 1 to 2016. Then the smallest possible sum of 2016 of the remaining elements is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017+2018+\cdots + 4032 = 1008 \cdot 6049 = 6097392"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"so clearly "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N\ge 6097392"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". We will show that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N=6097392"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" works. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,2\cdots 6097392"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" contains the integers from 1 to 6048, so pair these numbers as follows: "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1, 6048"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2, 6047"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3, 6046"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\cdots"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3024, 3025"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"When we remove any 2016 integers from the set "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,2\cdots N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", clearly we can remove numbers from at most 2016 of the 3024 pairs above, leaving at least 1008 complete pairs. To get a sum of N, simply take these 1008 pairs, all of which sum to 6049. The sum of these 2016 elements is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1008 \cdot 6049 = 6097392"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", as desired. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We have shown that N must be at least 6097392, and that this value is attainable. Therefore our answer is 6097392."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016's in π \pi π !
2016's maximum
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \\large  \\left( \\sum_{\\text{cyc}} \\dfrac{x^{2016}}{y^{2016} + z^{2016} + 3} \\right) + (1-x)(1-y)(1-z) "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0\\leq x,y,z \\leq 1 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", find the maximum value of the expression above."}]}]}
